Key Match Events: Jos Buttler’s unbeaten 83-run innings off just 38 balls — including seven sixes
Adil Rashid starred to keep the co-hosts in check
Chris Jordan took a hat-trick — three wickets in three consecutive balls
England chased down the U.S. target of 116 with a mammoth 62 balls to spare
Post-Match Reflections: U.S. captain Aaron Jones admitted they weren’t as disciplined as they should be
Jones suggested they might have run out of steam after a tough last two games
The U.S. will automatically be part of the next T20 World Cup in 2026
Miscellaneous Highlights: England captain Buttler was devastating with the bat
The U.S. was a revelation in its first global competition
England now awaits their semifinal opponent with South Africa
The winners of the semifinals will face off against India, Australia, Afghanistan or Bangladesh in the final
